评论概述: I love, love, love this robe
评论详情: It's exactly what I was looking for! When I read all the positive reviews my only concern was "once size." That meant it might be too big or too small. Nevertheless, though it is quite large (I'm about a women's size medium), I like the roominess of it and coverage. There is nothing skimpy about this robe. I would definitely recommend to a friend, or buy another one for a family member. It's worth every penny.

评论详情: I loved everything about this robe-the feel, the look, the size, warmth-and I feel sooo good when I put it on. I didn’t want light weight-I love a soft, heavy robe. I’m 5’6” and it goes below my mid calf . There’s more than enough room and doesn’t fly open when wearing it.
Super comfy, fits great, cozy after my bath, nice long sash, and the robe is thick.  Totally love this robe. Well worth buying.
Best robe I’ve ever had by far! Thick, comfy and comes out of the wash like new. Love this robe so much ❤️

Truly luxurious robe. Super soft, absorbent, thick fabric and plenty of room. I’m 5”6’ 165lbs and it overlaps a lot but I don’t mind. I washed it twice already and it feels no different. Lengthwise: just below my knee caps. Color is beautiful, clean and crisp white. It’s a bit pricey but I expect it will last for long time so it’s worth it
And absorbent. Size is nice and roomy.
I recently went on a cruise. I wanted a robe similar to the one they gave us to wear on the ship. This one was even better!
This is my 2nd robe from this company… the last one lasted 8 yrs.  I love the robe !

Thick and absorbent. Slightly oversized for my 5’7 frame which was just what I wanted. Feels just like the luxury hotel robes that I use when we travel. Exactly what I would expect from the description. Didn’t disappoint. Very happy with my purchase!
Loved robe texture
Wife happy then everyone is happy. She uses it daily. Don’t skimp on quality for something that is used literally daily for your significant other. Just do it… would buy again.

Really nice robe! I bought this for my boyfriend for Christmas and he loved it. It’s nice and soft. Quality is good for the price too.

评论概述: This is the best robe out there
评论详情: I was looking for a robe that would be absorbent like a towel and this is it! It’s very warm and heavy which is perfect for going from the hot tub back inside. It dries very well unlike many other robes. Well worth the money.
Exact same robes that they have in the Marriott that I love! It’s a long and soft, oversized and very absorbent and beautiful, bought a second one for guests

评论概述: Velour on the outside and towel terry on the inside.
评论详情: I have searched high and low for this robe. Many hotels have switched to the waffle light weight robes. Now when I spa I can bring my own. Many bathrobes are terry on both sides which is not my preference. I like the soft smoothness of the velour on the outside and the fluffy towel terry on the inside.After a moisturizing body scrub, you can just put it on without toweling off first. The robe absorbs excess water but leaves the moisturizer on your skin. I hope they  keep selling these as they are hard to come by and a good value. My last one similar different brand lasted for years. This robe has a little weight to it, but I prefer it over the fleece robes now being offered- they don't absorb well. This robe feels like quality to me just like a high end bath towel.

This robe is helping me survive showering during the cold Chicago winter. I was worried about fit since it's one size but it works for me. For reference I'm a women's size 16 or XXL, and I'm 5'2". It closes just right on the top without spilling out but have room to spare around my stomach. It hits at my calfs and I like it that way. This is a definitely heavy robe so probably won't work for summer. My only observation is that it's not extremely soft (it's ok) but it is cozy. Hoping it softens up after more washes.

I spent days looking for quality robes and each time I thought I found one the reviews of poor quality turned me away. These robes are just like what you would find in an expensive hotel! They have a bit of weight to them which is what I wanted for the cold walks out to the hot tub. If you are looking for quality, well worth the price!
This is a top quality robe that is stitched for longevity. It is heavy, but a one size fits all that is perfect for me and my husband, as well as our guest rooms. Treat yourself!
Wonderful robe.  Makes you feel like you're at a spa every time you slip it on.
Soft
This is a great high quality robe that is worth every penny.
Good gift
Gave to my son for Christmas and he loves it!

评论概述: Snuggle up. This robe will make you wish you could wear it to work.
评论详情: This robe is snuggly and the quality is fantastic. It's so comfy you'll want to wear it all day (even to the office). The price may deter potential buyers, but if you are a frequent robe donner, you should consider investing in the Marriott robe. For those of us that dislike  tags, this robe has scratchy ones, but the tag irritation is easily removed by simply cutting out the tags and label.
